results.title: Simvastatin attenuates leukocyte recruitment in experimental bacterial meningitis.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ attenuates CNS leukocyte recruitment and systemic complications of experimental @<m>DISEASE_Meningitis_Pneumococcal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008586 @@@pneumococcal meningitis@@@.
